title: Google Pixel 3XL touch sensitivity issue. I have to press long to detect a single tap.
content:
Everything was working fine since 2 weeks back. Quite sudden the touch screen lost its sensitivity ( I haven't done any changes or updated anything.) 

Issue:
The tap is not working. I had to press long for detecting a touch. So when long press is needed I cannot do it as it is taking as a single tap.
Also scrolling, pinching etc has issue. 
 The phone its pretty new and did'nt use much.

Phone Model is Google Pixel 3XL
Tried:
Turning off developer mode
Restarting
Booting in Safe mode
Factory reset.

But the issue still persist.  The phone has warranty. 
But due to the current social lockdown and lack of online services we are unable to do it. (I brought it through Amazon.ae, and I am currently in India)  Kindly help . Appreciate you valuable reply.
